about_the_game:
Be fully armed with three skillfully crafted powerful tackle sets to battle supernatural creatures. While a sturdy oilskin coat will shield you from storms and bad weather, you'll have all the essential mission lures, the coolest coffin rod case, exclusive stringer to keep the monsters, extra Storage Slots, and access to all key locations with Licenses and Premium Account to ensure you're equipped for every possible challenge. Don't waste time - explore the Chronicles of the Haunted Fleet and save the world from the forces of darkness!

Supernatural Explorer Pack includes:
* 6666 CREDITS
* 13 BAITCOINS
* 14-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Slots
* 3 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Tribal Totem 12' 10" (390) - Length: 12' 10" (3.9 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 9 7/8 Oz (170–280 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 39.7 – 81.6 Lb (18–37 kg); Action: Moderate
* Wicked Viking 8' 6" (260) - Length: 8' 6" ( 2.6 m); Line Weight: 28.6–83.8 Lb (13–38 kg); Action: Moderate
* Silverthorn Stake 7' 6" (230) - Length: 7' 6" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 3 1/6 Oz (24–90 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 35.3–88 Lb (16–40 kg); Action: Fast

Reels:
* Savanna Spirit 11000 - Ratio: 5.2; Recovery: 43.3" (110 cm); Capacity: Mono 84/131 (0.85/131), Braid 76/318 (0.35/318); Max Drag: 79.4 Lb (36 kg); Drag: Front
* Nordic Beast 12000 - Ratio: 5.6; Recovery: 47.2" (120 cm); Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid 44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 81.5 Lb (37 kg); Drag: Front
* Vampire's Bane 7500 - Ratio: 6.7; Recovery: 43.3" (110 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/150 (0.5/150), Braid 30/265 (0.28/265); Max Drag: 83.7 Lb (38 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1300 yd (1300 m):
Catfish Moustache Line - Test: 79.3 Lb (36 kg)
Fluoro .033" (0.85 mm) - Test: 79 Lb (36 kg)
Mono .033" (0.85 mm) - Test: 83.7 Lb (38 kg)

* Steel Leader (x13) - Length: 0.5 yd (0.5 m); Test: 79.3 Lb (36 kg)
* Horsehair Leader (x13) - Length: 2 yd (2 m); Test: 77.1 Lb (35 kg)
* Titanium Leader .018" (0.45) (x13) - Length: 0.5 yd (0.5 m); Test: 81.5 Lb (37 kg)

* Hell's Bell
* Hooks: #1/0 (x13), #2/0 (x13), #3/0 (x13), #4/0 (x13), #5/0 (x13), #6/0 (x13), #7/0 (x13), #8/0 (x13), #9/0 (x13), #10/0 (x13)
* Skull Jig 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #5/0 (x13)
* Armored Slider (x1)
* Monkey Skull Sinker 7 Oz. (200 g) (x3)
* Rusty Cage Feeder 5 2/3 Oz. (160 g) (x3)
* Labradorite Flat Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #6/0 (x5)
* Silver Bullet 2 1/2 Oz. (70 g), #7/0 (x3)
* Piranha Duo Swimbait 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0 (x3)
* Silicone Finger 3" (7.5 cm) (x13)
* Baits: Large Liver (x42), Dried Fish Heads (x42), Rotten liver (x42), Suttungr’s Mead (x42), Pig's heart (x42), Boiled Crawfish (x42), Cursed Aracu Minnow (x42), Blood Dough Balls (x42), Dobsonfly Larva (x42), Bloody Flies (x42), Poisonous Maggots (x42)
* Firefly Groundbait (x3)


EQUIPMENT
* Oilskin Coat - Tackles: 21; Lines: 13
* Coffin Rod Case - Rods: 3; Reels: 4; Lines: 3
* Spine Stringer - Max Single Fish Weight: 489.4 Lb; Total Fish Weight: 734 Lb; Fish-Friendly: No


FISHING LICENSES (14 days):
Advanced Missouri License
Advanced Colorado License
Advanced Italy License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Peru License
Advanced Bolivia License
Advanced Brazil License
Advanced Congo License


POND PASSES (14 days):
Mudwater River
Rocky Lake
Tiber River
Sander Baggersee Lake
Maku-Maku Lake
Marron River
Amazonian Maze
Congo River

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
